member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFactory
member.summary: Class for creating discrete functions. The functions created have the same properties as the DiscreteFactory-Class.

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log$ Revision 1.2 2005/10/11 22:05:14 helgeh - Added NUnit project and NDoc documentation. - fixed a bug in AdjustSamplingRate
Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:19 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.
XmlSeffParser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunctionFactory
member.summary: Abstract Factory pattern.

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log$ Revision 1.2 2005/10/11 22:05:14 helgeh - Added NUnit project and NDoc documentation. - fixed a bug in AdjustSamplingRate
Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:19 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.
XmlSeffParser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunctionFactory.ExponentialDistribution(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the exponential distribution with a rate. This is: f(x) = (1 / rate) * exp(- x (1 / rate)).
member.returns: Exponential distribution with the specified rate and properties of the FunctionFactory.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunctionFactory.ExponentialDistribution(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Double,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the exponential distribution with a rate. This is: f(x) = (1 / rate) * exp(- x (1 / rate)).
member.returns: Exponential distribution with the specified rate and properties of the FunctionFactory.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunctionFactory.ConstantFunction(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the constant function. This is: f(x) = c.
member.returns: Function with a constant value.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunctionFactory.DiracDeltaFunction
member.summary: Returns the dirac function which is the neutral element of the convolution. This is: f(0) = infty and f(x) = 0 for x != 0.
member.returns: Dirac function of length one. Function value is 1.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunctionFactory.Copy(Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction)
member.summary: Creates a copy of a IDiscreteFunction with the parameters given by the factory.
member.returns: Copied IDiscreteFunction.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunctionFactory.DiscreteValueFunction(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Double[])
member.summary: Creates a new function using a set of values. The sampling rate for those values must correspond to the sampling rate of the factory. Also the start value must be a multiple of the sampling rate.
member.param: Position on the x axis for the first value in the value array.
Ordered set of values describing the function.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunctionFactory.DiscreteValuePDFunction(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Double[])
member.summary: Creates a new probability density function using a set of values.
member.param: Position on the x axis for the first value in the value array.
Ordered set of values describing the function.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunctionFactory.DiscreteValuePDFunction(Palladio.Performance.Math.IFourierFunction)
member.summary: Creates a new probability density function. The fourier function is transformed back to the time domain.
member.returns: Function in time domain.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunctionFactory.DiscreteValuePDFunction(Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction)
member.summary: Creates a new probability density function using a set of values.
member.param: Function which contains the probability density function.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunctionFactory.DiscreteFourierFunction(MathNet.Numerics.Complex[],System.Int64)
member.summary: Creates a new fourier function. It is assumed, that the complex values are the fourier transformed values.
member.returns: Function in frequency domain.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunctionFactory.DiscreteFourierFunction(Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction)
member.summary: Creates a new fourier function.
member.returns: Function in frequency domain.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunctionFactory.SamplingRate
member.summary: Precision for the created functions.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunctionFactory.XMax
member.summary: Default maximum for the greatest x value that has an associated function value.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunctionFactory.XMin
member.summary: Default minimum for the smallest x value that has an associated function value.

member.name: F:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFactory.samplingRate
member.summary: Distance between two values.

member.name: F:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFactory.xmax
member.summary: Maximum x-value

member.name: F:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFactory.xmin
member.summary: Minimum x-value.

member.name: F:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFactory.width
member.summary: xmax - xmin.

member.name: F:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFactory.defaultLength
member.summary: Default length of the value array: width / precision

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFactory.#ctor
member.summary: Creates discrete function factory with default values. The sampling rate is set to 1, xmin is set to 0 and xmax is set to 10.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFactory.DiscreteValueFunction(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Double[])
member.summary: Creates a new function using a set of values. The sampling rate for those values must correspond to the sampling rate of the factory. Also the start value must be a multiple of the sampling rate. All values other than the given ones are set to zero.
member.param: Position on the x axis for the first value in the value array.
Ordered set of values describing the function.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFactory.DiscreteValuePDFunction(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Double[])
member.summary: Creates a new probability density function using a set of values.
member.param: Position on the x axis for the first value in the value array.
Ordered set of values describing the function.

member.summary: Creates a new probability density function. The fourier function is transformed back to the time domain.
member.returns: Function in time domain.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFactory.DiscreteValuePDFunction(Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction)
member.summary: Creates a new probability density function using a set of values.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFactory.DiscreteFourierFunction(MathNet.Numerics.Complex[],System.Int64)
member.summary: Creates a new fourier function. It is assumed, that the complex values are the fourier transformed values.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFactory.DiscreteFourierFunction(Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction)
member.summary: Creates a new fourier function. The values are transformed to the frquency space.

member.summary: Returns the exponential distribution with a rate. This is: f(x) = (1 / rate) * exp(- x (1 / rate)).
member.returns: Exponential distribution with the specified rate and properties of the FunctionFactory.

member.summary: Returns the exponential distribution with a rate. This is: f(x) = (1 / rate) * exp(- x (1 / rate)).
member.returns: Exponential distribution with the specified rate and properties of the FunctionFactory.

member.summary: Sets the class variables.

member.summary: Precision for the created functions.

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFunction
member.summary: A Class for discrete value function. The discrete values are hold in an arrayand are equidistant with the distance between two values in the array is given by the sampling rate. So the x-value for index data[i] is xmin + i*samplingrate.

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log$ Revision 1.2 2005/10/11 22:05:14 helgeh - Added NUnit project and NDoc documentation. - fixed a bug in AdjustSamplingRate
Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:19 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.
XmlSeffParser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction
member.summary: A Class for discrete value function. The discrete values are hold in an arrayand are equidistant with the distance between two values in the array is given by the sampling rate. So the x-value for index data[i] is xmin + i*samplingrate.

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log$ Revision 1.2 2005/10/11 22:05:14 helgeh - Added NUnit project and NDoc documentation. - fixed a bug in AdjustSamplingRate
Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:19 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.
XmlSeffParser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.Sum
member.summary: Returns the sum of all function values.
member.returns: Sum of all function values.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.ExpandDomain(System.Int64)
member.summary: Expands the domain of the function to the new value of xMax. If xMax is not a multiple of the samplingrate, it is set to the next multiple. All new values are set to zero.
member.param: New maximum x-value. If the value is smaller than the old xMax a ApplicationException is thrown.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.ExpandDomain(System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Expands the domain of the function to the new value of xMax and xMin. If xMax or xMin are not a multiple of the samplingrate, they are set to the next multiple. All new values are set to zero.
member.param: New maximum x-value. If the value is smaller than the old xMax an ApplicationException is thrown.
New minimum x-value. If the value is bigger than the old xMin anApplicationException is thrown.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.ExpandDomainPo2(System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Expands the domain of the function to the new value of xMax and xMin. If xMax or xMin are not a multiple of the samplingrate, they are set to the next multiple. Furthermore additional values are added, so the size of the function becomes a power of 2. All new values are set to zero.
member.param: New maximum x-value. If the value is smaller than the old xMax an ApplicationException is thrown.
New minimum x-value. If the value is bigger than the old xMin anApplicationException is thrown.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.Crop
member.summary: Removes 0-Values at beginning and end.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.NumberOfNullValues
member.summary: Return the number of values which probability is 0.
member.returns: Number of values.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.AdjustSamplingRate(System.Int64)
member.summary: Adjust the function to a new SamplingRate. The new Sampling rate must be a multiple or a divisor of the old one. The size of the data array is adjusted hold the values.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.FunctionWithNValues(System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a Function with n values. The sampling rate will be adjusted
member.param: Number of values for the new function.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.ToFile(System.IO.StreamWriter)
member.summary: Writes the function to a file.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.ValueAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the time value (value on the x-axis) of the specified index.
member.returns: Time for which the data array contains the probability or -1 if index is out of range.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.DismissValuesSmalerThanN(System.Double)
member.summary: Eleminates values at beginning and end of the data array whose probability is smaller than n.
member.param: Threashhold probability. Smaller values shall be eleminated.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.Scale(System.Double)
member.summary: Scales this function by a.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.GetScaled(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns a copy of the function scaled by the given factor.
member.param: Factor with which the data is scaled.
member.returns: Copy of the function scaled by factor.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.Convolution(Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction)
member.summary: Convolution for discrete Functions. The two functions must have the same SamplingRate.
member.param: IDiscreteFunction dg for the convolution with the object.
member.returns: A new Function containing the result of the operation.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.Add(Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction)
member.summary: Adds a function to this.
member.returns: A new Function containing the result of the operation.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.AddScaled(System.Double,Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction)
member.summary: Adds a function g scaled by a to the existing function.
member.returns: A new Function containing the result of the operation.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.Multiply(Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction)
member.summary: Multiplies this function with another function.
member.param: Function to be multiplied with this.
member.returns: A new Function containing the result of the operation.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.ValueOf(System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns the function value of x, that is f(x).
member.returns: f(x) if x is a multiple of the samplingrate. Otherwise an ApplicationException is thown.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.MaximunDataValue
member.summary: Returns the maximum value of the function.
member.returns: The maximum value of the function.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.Data
member.summary: Values defining the function.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.Count
member.summary: Number of discrete function values.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.SamplingRate
member.summary: Precision of the disctrete function x[n]. Distance between two discrete values on the x-axis.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.XMin
member.summary: First x value for which this function is defined.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction.XMax
member.summary: Last x value for which this function is defined.

member.name: F:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFunction.data
member.summary: Array of function values.

member.name: F:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFunction.samplingRate
member.summary: Distance between two function values.

member.name: F:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFunction.xmin
member.summary: Minimal x value for which a value is listed in the value array.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFunction.NextPowerOfTwo(System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns a number that is the nearest power of two to minmin.
member.param: Lower bound of the returned number.
member.returns: A number that is the nearest power of two to min.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFunction.#ctor(System.Double[],System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Creates new function.
member.param: x distance of the values in the array.
x value for the first entry in the value array.

member.summary: Copy Constructor.

member.summary: Values that are smaller than n are set to zero.

member.summary: Expands the domain of the function to the new value of xMax. If xMax is not a multiple of the samplingrate, it is set to the next multiple. All new values are set to zero.
member.param: New maximum x-value. If the value is smaller than the old xMax a ApplicationException is thrown.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFunction.ExpandDomain(System.Int64,System.Int64)

member.param: New maximum x-value. If the value is smaller than the old xMax an ApplicationException is thrown.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFunction.ExpandDomainPo2(System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Expands the domain of the function to the new value of xMax and xMin. If xMax or xMin are not a multiple of the samplingrate, they are set to the next multiple. Furthermore additional values are added, so the size of the function becomes a power of 2. All new values are set to zero.
member.param: New maximum x-value. If the value is smaller than the old xMax an ApplicationException is thrown.
New minimum x-value. If the value is bigger than the old xMin an ApplicationException is thrown.

member.summary: Returns the sum of all function values.
member.returns: Sum of all function values.

member.summary: Returns a flat copy of the function.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFunction.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares both objects of equality. The values of the function are compared to the 10th decimal place.
member.param: Object which is compared with this.
member.returns: True if both objects are equal. False else.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFunction.GetHashCode
member.summary: Hash function.
member.returns: Hashcode

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFunction.XMin
member.summary: Smallest x value for which an entry in the value array exists.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFunction.XMax
member.summary: Greatest x value for which an entry in the value array exists.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFunction.Data
member.summary: Array of discrete function values.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFunction.Count
member.summary: Number of function values.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscreteFunction.SamplingRate
member.summary: Distance (x-axis) between two entries in the value array. If the samplingrate is set to a new value, the function values will be adjusted.

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscretePDFunction
member.summary: A Class for a probability density function of a random variable.

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log$ Revision 1.2 2005/10/11 22:05:14 helgeh - Added NUnit project and NDoc documentation. - fixed a bug in AdjustSamplingRate
Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:19 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.
XmlSeffParser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

Version history:
$Log$ Revision 1.2 2005/10/11 22:05:14 helgeh - Added NUnit project and NDoc documentation. - fixed a bug in AdjustSamplingRate
Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:19 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.
XmlSeffParser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscretePDFunction.SaveAsXml(System.String)
member.summary: Stores the probability density function as file.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscretePDFunction.FunctionWithNValues(System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a Function with n values. The sampling rate will be adjusted
member.param: Number of values for the new function.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscretePDFunction.TotalProb
member.summary: Sum of all probabilities.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscretePDFunction.Median
member.summary: Median og the function.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscretePDFunction.UpperQuartil
member.summary: Returns the time value of the upper quartil(75%).

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscretePDFunction.Expectancy
member.summary: Expectancy of the function.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscretePDFunction.Variance
member.summary: Variance of the function. This is s^2=(1/n) * sum_1_n[(x_i - expectancy)^2]

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscretePDFunction.Deviation
member.summary: Deviation of a function. This is SQRT(Variance)

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscretePDFunction.FunctionWithNValues(System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a Function with n values. The sampling rate will be adjusted
member.param: Number of values for the new function.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscretePDFunction.GetTimeValueOfPercentile(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the time value of a percentile.
member.param: Percentile for which the time value is requested.
member.returns: Time value of a percentile.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Functions.Discrete.DiscretePDFunction.SaveAsXml(System.String)
member.summary: Stores the probability density function as file.

member.summary: Creates new function.
member.param: x distance of the values in the array.
x value for the first entry in the value array.

member.summary: Copy Constructor.

member.summary: Returns a copy of the DiscretePDFunction.

member.summary: Median of the function.

member.summary: Returns the time value of the upper quartil(75%).

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.Math.Fourier.DiscreteFourierFunction
member.summary: Class for a fourier transformed discrete function.

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log$ Revision 1.2 2005/10/11 22:05:14 helgeh - Added NUnit project and NDoc documentation. - fixed a bug in AdjustSamplingRate
Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:19 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.
XmlSeffParser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.Math.IFourierFunction
member.summary: Fourier transformed function. The data array must be big enough to hold all calculated values, because a redimensioning of the array in frequency space leads to wrong results.

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log$ Revision 1.2 2005/10/11 22:05:14 helgeh - Added NUnit project and NDoc documentation. - fixed a bug in AdjustSamplingRate
Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:19 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.

FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.

PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IFourierFunction.Multiply(Palladio.Performance.Math.IFourierFunction)
member.summary: Multiplication of each pair of elements. Both functions must have the same length.
member.param: IFourierFunction to be multiplied with this.
member.returns: New IFourierFunction holding the result of the multiplication.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IFourierFunction.Add(Palladio.Performance.Math.IFourierFunction)
member.summary: Addition of each pair of elements. Both functions must have the same length.
member.param: IFourierFunction to be added with this.
member.returns: New IFourierFunction holding the result of the addition.

member.summary: Returns a copy of the function sclaed by factor
member.returns: New scaled IFourierFunction.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IFourierFunction.ComputeLoopLimit(System.Double)
member.summary: Computes the execution time of a loop. This is an approximation which depends on the size of the data array.
member.param: Probability of re-iterating through the loop.
member.returns: The fourier function of the loop limit.

member.summary: Minimum value on the x-axis.

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.Math.Fourier.FastFourierTransformation
member.summary: Class for the fast fourier transformation. For further information have a look into "Introduction to Algorithms" by Cormen et al.

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log$ Revision 1.2 2005/10/11 22:05:14 helgeh - Added NUnit project and NDoc documentation. - fixed a bug in AdjustSamplingRate
Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:19 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.
XmlSeffParser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.
XmlSeffParser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IFourierTransform.Forward(MathNet.Numerics.Complex[])
member.summary: Transforms a set of complex values from the time space into the frequency space.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IFourierTransform.ForwardFromReal(System.Double[])
member.summary: Transforms a set of real values from the time space into the (complex) frequency space.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IFourierTransform.Backward(MathNet.Numerics.Complex[])
member.summary: Transforms a set of complex values from the frequency space to the time space.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IFourierTransform.BackwardToReal(MathNet.Numerics.Complex[])
member.summary: Transforms a set of complex values from the frequency space to the time space and converts the result to real values by neglecting the imaginary part.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Fourier.FastFourierTransformation.Forward(MathNet.Numerics.Complex[])
member.summary: Fast fourier transformation forward.
member.returns: Function values in frequency space.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Fourier.FastFourierTransformation.ForwardFromReal(System.Double[])
member.summary: Fast fourier transformation forward.
member.returns: Function values in frequency space.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Fourier.FastFourierTransformation.Backward(MathNet.Numerics.Complex[])
member.summary: Fast fourier transformation backward.
member.returns: Function values in time space.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Fourier.FastFourierTransformation.BackwardToReal(MathNet.Numerics.Complex[])
member.summary: Fast fourier transformation backward.
member.returns: Function values in time space.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Fourier.FastFourierTransformation.TransformRecursive(MathNet.Numerics.Complex[],System.Double)
member.summary: Fourier transformation. if direction is true -> forward if direction is false -> backward
member.returns: Transformed values.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Fourier.FastFourierTransformation.PowerOf2(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks whter a number is a power of two.

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.Math.Fourier.SimpleFourierTransform
member.summary: Class for the simple fourier transformation.

For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Fourier.SimpleFourierTransform.Transform(MathNet.Numerics.Complex[],System.Double)
member.summary: if direction is true -> forward if direction is false -> backward

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.Math.Test.DiscreteFunctionTest
member.summary: Zusammenfassung fr DiscreteFunctionTest.

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.Math.Test.DiscretePDFunctionTest
member.summary: Zusammenfassung fr DiscreteFunctionTest.

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.Math.Test.FourierTest
member.summary: Zusammenfassung fr FourierTest.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Test.FourierTest.FourierTransform
member.summary: This tests, that the data array is not changed while silmy transform in the frequency domain and transform back to the time domain.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Test.FourierTest.FourierTransformException
member.summary: This Test throws an ApplicationException, because the length of the data array is not a power of 2.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Test.FourierTest.FourierMultiplication
member.summary: This tests, that the multiplication in den frquency domain is the same as the convolution in the time domain. For this the data array must be big enough.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.Test.FourierTest.FourierAddition
member.summary: This tests, that the multiplication in den frquency domain is the same as the convolution in the time domain. For this the data array must be big enough.

member.summary: Creates the convolution of this function with a Function.

For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IFunctionFactory.ExponentialDistribution(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the exponential distribution with a rate. This is: f(x) = (1 / rate) * exp(- x (1 / rate)).

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IFunctionFactory.ConstantFunction(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the constant zero function. This is: f(x) = c.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IFunctionFactory.DiracDeltaFunction
member.summary: Returns the dirac function which is the neutral element of the convolution. This is: f(0) = infty and f(x) = 0 for x != 0.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.IFunctionFactory.Copy(MathNet.Numerics.IRealFunction)
member.summary: Creates a copy of f with the parameters given by the factory.

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.Math.MathTools
member.summary: This class gives Acces to creation of functions.

$Log$ Revision 1.2 2005/10/11 22:05:14 helgeh - Added NUnit project and NDoc documentation. - fixed a bug in AdjustSamplingRate
Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:19 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.
XmlSeffParser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.MathTools.GCD(System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Greatest Common Divisor. If one of the values is 0, then the other value is returned. If both values are 0, then 0 is returned.
member.returns: GCD of both values.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Math.MathTools.GCD(System.Int64[])
member.summary: Greatest Common Divisor.
member.param: Array of values for which the GCD is returned.
member.returns: GCD of the values.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.MathTools.DiscreteFunctions
member.summary: A Factory for creation of discrete function.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.MathTools.FourierTransform
member.summary: A Class for transforming discrete value functions from time domain to frequency domain or reverse.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.MathTools.FastFourierTransform
member.summary: A Class for transforming discrete value functions from time domain to frequency domain or reverse. Transformation uses recursive FFT.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Math.MathTools.SimpleFourierTransform
member.summary: Deprecated. A Class for transforming discrete value functions from time domain to frequency domain or reverse. Transformation uses simple transformation. Deprecated.
